name: Cell Mates
description:
Cellmates is a 2 player co-op platformer. Each player controls one of two nuclei in a single cell as they cooperate to move, jump, and stick to objects in order to escape a dangerous science lab.

Credits

Programming: Ana Damnjanovic, Yuantao Gu, Frank Huang, Jesse Jaura

Music / Sound Design: Nick Manalo

Character Design and Modeling: Adriana Smith

Animation and 3D Assets: Felix Chow, Adriana Smith

Level / Environment Design: Felix Chow, Guillaume Goder
